channel.title: AAS Share Chat Feed - London South East
channel.description: AAS Share Chat Feed - London South East

item.title: [Runner] good, going strong here
item.author: Runner
item.description: Great to have us getting back to 1000p again - I can see the momentum continuing. Still a clear BUY - money top be made in this sector.

item.title: [fundamentalanalysis] meant
item.author: fundamentalanalysis
item.description: to say there is quite a discount to NAV on AAS at the moment,must be because i watched carry on camping with the sketch saying all asses must be shown because the p had fallen off the sign at the camping site they turned up at why i had that on my mind, that sketch is incredibly funny.

item.title: [fundamentalanalysis] Discount
item.author: fundamentalanalysis
item.description: there is quite a discount to NAV on ASS at the moment,This is on my watch list from now on,i'm looking for some bargain shares and this is becoming one of them.

item.title: [pentex] Downhill Trend
item.author: pentex
item.description:
Price heading steadily downwards for past 4 weeks.
Same with SST
What is happening with Asia smaller companies?

item.title: [kulabkhan] drop
item.author: kulabkhan
item.description: Yes been in here a good long while also hold SST Must say these stocks have treated me very well indeed. There can be a bit of temporary volatility but the upward trend comes good again. These Asian smaller companies trusts are tremendous medium term investments in my view.

item.title: [Mnemosyne] Drop
item.author: Mnemosyne
item.description: AAS is one of the ways I looked to balance my portfolio with some exposure to the Far East. It has done very nicely indeed for me over the last few months, and the sudden drop is a surprise. Bet it's a surprise for Mrs Gilbert too, who has lost about £4.5k overnight on her 10,000 buy yesterday! Anyone else in here?
